body: You might want to use the `ViewHolder` pattern to make your list more efficient. Here's an [example](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3832254/how-can-i-make-my-arrayadapter-follow-the-viewholder-pattern)
Consider checking out the [ButterKnife library](http://jakewharton.github.io/butterknife/) to reduce boilerplate code associated with binding the views
